subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Chris Dailey, an associate head coach at Connecticut who has been at Geno Auriemma’s side for 29 years, has helped mold championship teams and the program’s image.
snippet: Chris Dailey, an associate head coach at Connecticut who has been at Geno Auriemma’s side for 29 years, has helped mold championship teams and the program’s image.
